GeneDef.label: fortress
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can temporarily sacrifice their super durability to fortify themselves further, reducing their movement greatly and making them immune to most attacks.

GeneDef.label: beelzebub
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can absorb the power from a corpse to gain permanent buffs based on the type and size of the corpse.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Absorbing a mechanoid gives ever-evolving (foodless) progress.
Absorbing an insectoid gives ever-evolving (lethality) progress.
Absorbing an entity gives ever-evolving (lethality) progress.
Absorbing anything else gives ever-evolving (enlightenment) progress.

GeneDef.label: regenerator
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can temporarily sacrifice their super healing to enhance their regenerative abilities to extreme levels for a couple hours.

GeneDef.label: hack mechanoid
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can quickly hack any mechanoid that they can touch, forcing it to turn violent against everything near it, a feat that makes the pawn fall unconscious for some time.

GeneDef.label: portent
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can temporarily sacrifice their super perception to predict what other beings around them will do, allowing them to avoid taking damage and improving their accuracy.

GeneDef.label: beguiler
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can temporarily sacrifice their super persuasion to beguile a hostile pawn, causing it to go berserk and attack everything around it.

GeneDef.label: snapshot
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can temporarily sacrifice their super precision to guide them on their next several shots. These shots have a negligible chance to miss, and the time between shots is greatly shortened.

GeneDef.label: sprinter
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can to push themselves to become nigh unstoppable in melee combat for a couple hours before falling unconscious due to overexertion.

GeneDef.label: titan strength
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can temporarily sacrifice their super strength to increase the melee damage they deal to extreme levels for an hour.
